NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
PLUME: Look at these marvels.. Friends, we have discovered a new species native to this star system!
2 1
MELORAE: I have never seen jellyfish as beautiful as these before! They look mesmerizing, dancing along the ocean's surface..
3 2
MELORAE: An update: Be cautious swimming in the waters near them, friends! These species appear to produce a lethal amount of bioelectricity.. I was nearly shocked by one hiding right beneath the ocean's surface earlier!
4 3
THATCH: How exhilarating! I cannot imagine what new species of life we may discover as we explore the rest of this star system.
Pioneer EX4 3
